room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was our first escape room experience and our family had a blast! We completed the Lost Kingdom room within 49 mins with one clue. The experience was so much fun and it was kid friendly and they loved helping. The staff was very friendly and even took a picture of us at the end. Thank you for a wonderful evening.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: My daughter and her friends had a great time tonight trying to figure out the mystery clues together. It was a great bonding experience for everyone. They all said that was fun & hard, but anything from boring! Good times:)

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We had a great time! This was our first time doing an escape room and it was so much fun. The puzzles were challenging and the story was fun (we did Lost Kingdom) and the owners were very friendly and helpful! We will definitely be back for the other rooms!
